Pre-Game Insights: Both teams have had a fantastic T20 run, with England beating South Africa 3-0 and India winning their last T20 series against Australia.
India has won the last two T20 series played against England.
The weather on 12th March '21 is expected to be warm and sunny with no chance of rain, suitable for batting.
The pitch is likely to be dusty and favorable for spinners based on the previous Test matches.
